bill_title: Honoring Todd Foster for being selected South Dakota Assistant Football Coach of the Year for Class 11A.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Todd Foster for being selected South Dakota Assistant Football Coach of the Year for Class 11A. WHEREAS, Todd Foster has been named Assistant Coach of the Year for three separate years: 1997, 1998, and now 2002; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is track coach and assistant football coach at Flandreau High School, coaches little league baseball, and is a member of the South Dakota High School Football Coaches Association; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is seated on the Flandreau Booster Club Board of Directors, and is Co-Chair of the NCA for the Flandreau School District; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is involved in the Moody County United for Youth Organization and the Moody County Child Protection Team: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Todd Foster, husband of Jolynn and father to Spenser and Mitchel, be recognized for his outstanding community service, dedication to the youth in his community, and as South Dakota's 2002 Assistant Coach of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Todd Foster for being selected South Dakota Assistant Football Coach of the Year for Class 11A. WHEREAS, Todd Foster has been named Assistant Coach of the Year for three separate years: 1997, 1998, and now 2002; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is track coach and assistant football coach at Flandreau High School, coaches little league baseball, and is a member of the South Dakota High School Football Coaches Association; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is seated on the Flandreau Booster Club Board of Directors, and is Co- Chair of the NCA for the Flandreau School District; and WHEREAS, Todd Foster is involved in the Moody County United for Youth Organization and the Moody County Child Protection Team: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Todd Foster, husband of Jolynn and father to Spenser and Mitchel, be recognized for his outstanding community service, dedication to the youth in his community, and as South Dakota's 2002 Assistant Coach of the Year.
